siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.
blogPost.body: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.
blogPost.title: Tails - The ultimate TailwindCSS drag'n drop page creator
blogPost.author: Tony Lea

localize.description: Tails是终极TailwinCSS页面创建器。需要一个网站来展示你的下一个好点子吗？Tails是创建漂亮登录页面的完美工具。超过120个设计模块，您可以混合搭配，为您的下一个项目制作完美的登录页。
Tails是終極TailwinCSS頁面創建器。需要一個網站來展示你的下一個好點子嗎？Tails是創建漂亮登錄頁面的完美工具。超過120個設計模塊，您可以混合搭配，爲您的下一個項目製作完美的登錄頁。

previous.excerpt: Easyclout is a powerful, simple, all-in-one social media management and growth platform that helps businesses reduce social media marketing costs with our state of the art AI bot. Saving you time, increase productivity, and achieve better business results.
previous.title: EasyClout - Social media management and growth platform

localize.description: Eascleout是一个强大、简单、一体式的社交媒体管理和增长平台，通过我们最先进的AI机器人帮助企业降低社交媒体营销成本。为您节省时间、提高工作效率并取得更好的业务成果。
localize.tagline: 社交媒体管理和增长平台

localize.description: Eascleout是一個強大、簡單、一體式的社交媒體管理和增長平臺，通過我們最先進的AI機器人幫助企業降低社交媒體營銷成本。爲您節省時間、提高工作效率並取得更好的業務成果。
localize.tagline: 社交媒體管理和增長平臺

next.excerpt: Base64.ai is a cloud API that can extract data, photos, and signatures from all types of documents. We have prebuilt models for IDs, driver licenses, passports, visas, invoices, and many more document types. The integration is only a single API call.
next.title: Base64.ai - Extract text, data, photos and more from all types of docs

localize.description: Base64.ai是一种云API，可以从所有类型的文档中提取数据、照片和签名。我们预建了ID、驾照、护照、签证、发票和更多文档类型的模型。集成只是一次API调用。
localize.tagline: 从所有类型的文档中提取文本、数据、照片等

localize.description: Base64.ai是一種雲API，可以從所有類型的文檔中提取數據、照片和簽名。我們預建了ID、駕照、護照、簽證、發票和更多文檔類型的模型。集成只是一次API調用。
localize.tagline: 從所有類型的文檔中提取文本、數據、照片等
